column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////came here for the first time last wknd for my birthday with 3 other great people. had heard great things
column2: and was not disappointed. definitely call/book ahead as they do get super crowded
column3: although it is a decent-sized place. i'm not super 'savvy' when it comes to tapas
column4: so it was fun to learn as we went. we ordered numerous small portions and passed them around the table to share. things you have to order:
